page.title: 04Leftwich Play School
page.content: Leftwich play school meets in a small hall every weekday morning.The children are between 3 and 5 years old.They have plenty to occupy them- painting ,group activities,games,We found on our visit that some of their favourite things involved getting messy!Play-doh,plasticine and the sandpit are all popular.Most of the time they would prefer to play among themselves e.g. imitating heroes on the T.V.,"Doctors and Nurses" etc. The games that both boys and girls liked playing were to do with jigsaws and dressing-up.Some children preferred to sit quietly and watch T.V. A similar play school meets in Davenham Church Hall.Like Leftwich they have trained women to lead the play activities and to teach the children simple things.
